sentences.sContent: Tropical year , and sidereal year are two different concepts .
sentences.sContent_eng: Tropical year , and sidereal year are two different concepts .
sentences.sCn: 在即回归年与恒星年是不同的两个概念。

sentences.sContent: And this was the way in which the sidero-solar problem was resolved, for the sidereal position of the full moon is in opposition to the invisible position of the sun.
sentences.sContent_eng: And this was the way in which the sidero-solar problem was resolved, for the sidereal position of the full moon is in opposition to the invisible position of the sun.
sentences.sCn: 这个方法之所以得以解决恒星-太阳问题，正是因为由恒星测定的满月位置与我们无法看到的太阳位置相反。

trans.tranOther: of, relating to, or involving the stars
